attributes.action: use his position to get television coverage of mixed martial arts events on terrestrial television for the benefit of all fans of this fast growing sport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At this moment in time in the world of MMA is non apparent to Britons if they dont have access to the internet or Sky TV. This is illogical as minor popularity sports get shown on TV on almost every sunday, whereas MMA (arguably the fastest growing sport in Britain today)is bypassed completley, even in quick news reports.
